mapper.select:
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, mem.MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_REG_DATE, MEMBER_AUTH, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_LAST_LOGIN_DATE, CASE WHEN MEMBER_PHONE IS NULL THEN "No Phone" ELSE MEMBER_PHONE END as MEMBER_PHONE, CASE WHEN MEMBER_POSTCODE IS NULL THEN "No Postcode" ELSE MEMBER_POSTCODE END as MEMBER_POSTCODE, CASE WHEN MEMBER_ADDRESS IS NULL THEN "No Address" ELSE MEMBER_ADDRESS END as MEMBER_ADDRESS FROM MEMBER mem LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_AUTH auth on mem.MEMBER_EMAIL = auth.MEMBER_EMAIL
ORDER BY MEMBER_ID DESC
